data.name: Westpac Choice
data.description: Westpac Choice is a simple to use everyday account packed full of features to help you bank with ease

features.additionalValue: Use your Debit Mastercard to shop securely online, access cash at ATMs and use PayPass to tap and go on purchases under $100

features.additionalInfo: Digital Card Security: It's a digital version of your card available 24/7 in the Westpac App. The 3-digit CVC security number changes daily to ensure your details are kept safe.
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.
Breathe easy knowing your money is safe: With a Westpac Choice account we?ve got your back with our 24/7 Fraud monitoring and Fraud Money Back Guarantee.

Under 18 Card Transactions Block: If the cardholder is under 18 years of age, a protective block is enabled by default on the card. This block is mandatory and will automatically be removed when the cardholder turns 18 years old.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.

The Westpac Mobile Banking App is an easy, secure and convenient way to take your bank with you wherever you go and with more than 100 features it can help you look after your money in more ways than you'd expect
Can't find your card? Don't panic, you can temporarily lock it in seconds with Card on Hold while you search
Shop securely with your debit card. We've got your back with 24/7 fraud monitoring and our Fraud Money Back Guarantee
Westpac Protect SMS Code : Increase your security when banking online by using your mobile phone to confirm certain transactions via text messages
If your Westpac account is compromised as a result of Internet fraud, we guarantee to repay any missing funds, providing you comply with our Online Banking Terms and Conditions

You can earn a higher variable interest on your savings when you grow your savings with a Westpac Life account and make 5 eligible purchases with a debit card linked to your Choice account each month. Offer is valid for customers aged between 18 - 29 years. Please visit the link below for more details

Special and exclusive offers on wellbooki, naked, THE ICONIC,Cinema Tickets,CIRCLES.LIFE, Bupa brands.Partner offers are subject to Terms and Conditions and may be varied or change at any time. Images are shown for illustrative purposes only.Fees and charges apply and may change.
Account can be opened via Online, mobile, in branch and telephone.
No minimum opening balance for this account
Statements : 6 monthly, or more frequently on request.
Cheque access is available.
You can pay bills using BPAY
Online , Mobile and telephone banking is available
Periodical Payments from this account can be made.
You can only hold one Westpac Choice account with a fee waiver. There is otherwise no limit to the number of Choice accounts.

Make shopping and ordering online even more safe and secure with Westpac My Merchants. Westpac My Merchants lets you shop and order online without needing to share your card details, because your card number is replaced with a unique identification code called a 'digital token'. This digital token, which won't contain your personal information and is used by the merchant instead of your card number, helping protect you online.
Temporary Overdraft is available subject to our normal lending criteria, and only if you?re 18 years or over.
Weekly Spend Limit will allow customers to set a limit on their accumulative weekly spend on their Debit Mastercard.

eligibility.additionalValue: Those with an Australian residential address and who are currently in Australia.

discounts.description: This fee is waived for: New and existing customers, aged 30 and above, who open a Choice account digitally.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Open a new Westpac Choice account online between 01/02/24 and 30/09/24 to have the monthly Account Keeping fee waived for the first 12 months.

discounts.description: This fee is waived for: Customers that deposit at least $2000 each month (other fees apply)
This fee is waived for: Customers under the age of 30
This fee is waived for: full-time tertiary students
This fee is waived for: Individuals who hold a Concession or Health Care card, or receive an eligible Australian Government benefit payment

eligibility.additionalInfo: Australian Pensioner Concession or Health Care Card holders

discounts.description: This fee is waived for: New to Australia or expatriate customers (for the first 12 months)

eligibility.additionalValue: New to Australia or expatriate customers (for the first 12 months)

fees.name: Online Banking
fees.additionalInfo: Online transfer withdrawals via Online Banking

fees.name: Westpac Group Branded ATM - Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Any withdrawal made at a Westpac/St.George/Bank of Melbourne/BankSA branded ATM

fees.name: Westpac Group Branded ATM - Balance Inquiry
fees.additionalInfo: Any balance Inquiry made at a Westpac/St.George/Bank of Melbourne/BankSA branded ATM

fees.name: Point of Sale (POS) transactions
fees.additionalInfo: All transactions conducted at a POS terminal.

fees.name: Telephone Banking (staff assisted)
fees.additionalInfo: A Telephone Banking transfer withdrawal assisted by a staff member over the telephone

fees.name: Cheque Withdrawals
fees.additionalInfo: Withdrawals or payments made by cheque. Excludes cashing of a cheque. Only available to customers aged 18 years and over.

fees.name: Direct Debit
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds from your account drawn under a Direct Debit request you gave another person or company.

fees.name: Branch staff assisted withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Includes any withdrawals conducted at a Westpac branch, including cashing of Westpac cheques.

fees.name: Periodical Payments
fees.additionalInfo: An automated transfer that is debited from your account and  credited to a specified account on a regular basis on your request. Additional fees apply for Periodical Payments made by Bank Cheque and International Periodical Payments. These additional fees are not included as part of any free monthly withdrawal allowance.

fees.name: Overseas Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Any successful cash withdrawal made at an overseas ATM. Some overseas banks may also apply a surcharge to cash withdrawals from their ATMs. This should be drawn to your attention before you proceed with your transaction. This surcharge amount will be added to your withdrawal amount, converted to Australian dollars and debited to your account as one transaction on the same day the transaction was made, or on the next business day. This fee is nil for cash withdrawals from Global ATM Alliance and Westpac Group partner ATMs. To find an overseas ATM visit westpac.com.au and search 'Global ATM Alliance'.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee (Merchant Outside Australia)
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located outside Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 1% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee)

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee (Australian merchant)
fees.additionalInfo: 2.2% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located in Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 0.2% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee).

lendingRates.additionalValue: The Unarranged Lending Rate (ULR) is a debit interest rate charged to a transaction account if it becomes overdrawn without arrangement. It will be calculated daily on the debit balance (and deducted on the last business day of each month) using the then current ULR until the account balance is positive again.
